Material_and_BC_Definitions: Material property libs (permittivity, conductivity, dielectric constants)
Boundary condition specs for waveports, scattering boundaries, radiation
Excitation_Parameters: Frequency sweeps, multi-port definitions, waveguide feeds
Pulse definitions for time-domain solvers (FDTD, TLM)
Solver_Settings: Convergence criteria, HPC parallel or GPU settings
Reference_Data: Measured S-parameters, antenna patterns, or RCS data for correlation
Legacy result sets or partial solutions from earlier versions
